/*MainMapper.selectCmmnSearch*/ select * from (select 'meeting' as gbn , m.title as data1 , date_format(m.dday, '%Y-%m-%d') as data2 , m.meeting_no as data_key from meeting m where 1=1 and m.title like concat('%',replace(#{srchWord}, ' ', ''),'%') union all select 'member' as gbn , mm.nick_nm as data1 , concat( case when cm.leave_yn = 'Y' then replace(mm.name, substr(mm.name , 2, 1), '*') else mm.nick_nm end , if(mm.email is not null and mm.email <> '', concat('(',mm.email,')'), '')) as data2 , mm.member_no as data_key from member mm join club_member cm on mm.member_no = cm.member_no where 1=1 and mm.nick_nm like concat('%',replace(#{srchWord}, ' ', ''),'%') or mm.name like concat('%',replace(#{srchWord}, ' ', ''),'%') union all select 'books' as gbn , bk.book_title as data1 , bk.book_writer as data2 , bk.book_no as data_key from books bk where 1=1 and bk.book_title like concat('%',replace(#{srchWord}, ' ', ''),'%') or bk.book_writer like concat('%',replace(#{srchWord}, ' ', ''),'%')
) tb where 1=1 order by gbn desc, data1 asc

select msg_no , send_member_no , (select concat(m.name,'(',m.nick_nm,')') as member_nm from member m where m.member_no = send_member_no) as send_member_nm , rcpt_member_no , (select concat(m.name,'(',m.nick_nm,')') as member_nm from member m where m.member_no = rcpt_member_no) as rcpt_member_nm , msg_cn , date_format(mx.confirm_dt, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%S') as confirm_dt , mx.reg_no , date_format(mx.reg_dt, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%S') as reg_dt from msg_box mx where mx.rcpt_member_no = #{memberNo}
